column5: Nice, I picked a Princecraft last spring.  Nice boat, I hope you get to use yours more often that I got to use mine in the first year.
Thanks John As long as i can remember, my dad, and his dad always had Princecraft and Mercs, thats why i am i love with this combo. Dad had a springbok too once, I think PC bought Springbok out.
real nice set up Mercman, and hats off to you for quitting smoking too.
Congrats on the new ride!! Get'r slimed up Real Good!!
So I'm assuming you didn't consider a "Smoker Craft"...
Nice pick up Paul. Ur gonna slay them this season
WOOT WOOT SEE YOU ON THE WATER
nice boat.....except for the console thingy,
ya i know, but i'm kind of a sissy
Is that new boat going to be red or PINK....
*SMILES*
depends if you are fishing with me Bob. Speaking of depends..................
Good luck on quitting smoking...Been a year and a half for me...  Use the patches, but keep the gum handy for the tough urges! It works, I'm a wuss and I did it!
What, you never had a wet fart.....

I feel just like a kid waiting for christmas !! I have been researching and planning for this for months.Bought a new boat on friday.Princecraft Starfish DLX SC. 40HP 4ST EFI Merc(my namesake) http://www.princecra...C/overview.aspx  The above is a 2011, mine is a 2010.Only dif is the color, mine is red, and the decal on mine is Gold, and the full length of the boat,other than that its identical. Picking it up in April, once the snows gone and i can get my boat out of the yard for the trade in  Cant wait to get er set up with the sonar and on the water.
Sweet Paul:  Guess you won't be posting much once the softwater hits, huh?  Between fishing, cleaning and eating , you'll have to won't have time for the  'puter till hard water seaso 2011?
Very nice, but this winter is going to seem like it lasts forever now.
Yeah Paul  :clapping: That's a great new ride. I just finished wiping the drool off the iPad. What's the wife getting??? ( besides the obvious    )  Congrats, Simon
Congrats on the New Toy SBK
Nice   ride
Congrats on the new purchase. My dad has the 164ss with the 115 merc. Princecrafts are awesome boats!

Thanks dude !!! Well, heres the story.Got on my knees, and wept like a kid in walmart toy dept.After i told her how comfortable we would be in it, she said OK. As i stood up and was dusting off my knees, she said "on one condition"......... "you quit smoking" I have a carton left, and this boy is gonna be smoke free.I garantee it, i think, i hope, i   i	aye aye aye.......... She quit 3 years ago, so she will be a good help to me.
you can quit i tryed and tryed to quit then the wife siad if you want a new sled you quit smoking its been almost 15 years the sled is long gone but at least i am still
gerat looking boat enjoy
Nice rig.

the money you save from cigs will pay for the new ride in no time Paul ! Good on ya!. - Hard, but stick with it, its worth it!  then you can get a fishfinder / plotter, trolling motor, new set up, custom canvas....... last pack I bought was at a Mac's Milk. said for years I would quit when it was a buck a pack, remember those days? Paid $1.05 for a 20 pack then quit - cold turkey  Tough, but paid off. good luck and stick with it
Congradulations, on the new ride! and. the best of luck quiting. YOU CAN DO IT!!!!
Good for you Paul a nice boat and all the fresh air you can breath.   Art
We can launch it next week and do some ice fishing if you want Paul... I have a chain saw to cut the hole!
Dont ask me twice Wayne !!! i'm just itchin over here.
Thanks Art. i think i'm making the right decision. i KNOW i am
that's just about the best reason to quit smoking i've ever seen!  the patch wouldn't be necessary if all wives were as cool as yours!  (can you talk to my wife by chance?)

In a couple of weeks I will be at a year without smokes.  I smoked 2 packs a day.  You can do it.  First couple of weeks is really rough.  Now I do not even crave anymore. You will be fine.  You better be or your old lady will kill you.  You can't go back on it now you have the boat.  Good luck
Awesome ride Paul    Congrats Now get back into making them lures eh Thanks for sharing Jacques
Thanks for the support G In may it will be 23 years since i quit the booze.I think i have a really good chance with the cigs too.
Very nice!!  Should have used that angle for quitting smoking two and a half years ago, maybe I'd have a bigger boat
Beauty boat and the best of luck to you on kicking the butts!
nice rig.  You have a red starfish!!!!    Life is good.  Good luck with the no smoking as well.
Now gotta get some new fishing shirts and i"ll be a 'well dressed man' in a red starfish
